name: Lancea
description: Introduced in 6819, the Lancea is TOG's standard light reconnaissance and interceptor fighter. Like the Commonwealth's Cheetah, the Lancea's main claim to game is its speed. In a reconnaissance role, the wing lasers are replaced with hard points and mounted with a variety of ordnance of surveillance equipment. With 11 Gs of acceleration, a high-thrust Lancea is one of the fastest fighters in the galaxy.

name: Verutum
description: The Verutum is an older light fighter that entered service in 6775 during the final stages of the TOG campaign against the KessRith Empire. Its design parameters called for a fighter that could perform missions similar to the Penetrator's interceptions and standing off strike missions.
